metadata.title: CVE-2020-15095 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - low.
metadata.description:
Versions of the npm CLI prior to 6.14.6 are vulnerable to an information exposure vulnerability through log files. The CLI supports URLs like "<protocol>://[<user>[:<password>]@]<hostname>[:<port>][:][/]<path>". The password value is not redacted and is printed to stdout and also to any generated log files.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo ua fix CVE-2020-15095` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

npm - 6.14.6+ds-1ubuntu1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: npm package in impish, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '6.14.6+ds-1ubuntu1').
